name: Two Beautiful Murder Machines
description:
TWO BEAUTIFUL AMERICAN ANGELS IN THE SKY

The founding fathers cry. Two Trucks. 

This is a 2 player game about LOVE, PASSION, ROMANCE and INTIMACY. It will make your heart PUMP with powerful JOY. It will taste of BURNT RUBBER on HOT ROADS. Your muscles, your muscles, will involuntarily. FLEX. 

You play the COURTSHIP of two BEAUTIFUL CARS. This ROMANTIC WHIRLWIND may end with you POUNDING, but only if you want. Otherwise, you can ENJOY THE RIDE. Vroom Vroom ;)
